_header: The year of grace plainly to describe
Subjects: Mary Magdalene, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Osbern Bokenam, ‘Life of St. Mary Magdalene’ — Prolocutory (282 lines) in couplets; Prologue in eight-line stanzas; Life in rhyme royal

BLAru327.First Lines:
The yer of grace plyenly to decryueA thowsand four hundryd fourty
                    & fyue…
BLAru327.Last Lines:
…And whan her mortal fate doth hem hens sendeTo þe ioye
                    hem bryng wych neuer shal haue ende
BLAru327.Attributed Author:
Translated into englys be a doctor of dyuyinte clepyd Osbern
                    Bokenam…Wrytyn in Cambryge by hys sonn ffrer Thomas Burgh (index, f.
                    193)
BLAru327.Attributed Title:
The prolucutorye in to marye mawdel lyf (rubric, f. 91v) The lyf
                    of marye maudeleyn (index, f. 193)
BLAru327.Editions:
Serjeantson,  Mary Sidney,
                        ed.  
             Osbern Bokenham: Legendys of Hooly Wummen.
EETS
         o.s. 206 (1938); repr. 1988: 136-72.
